titles.title: A joint resolution making further continuing appropriations for the fiscal year ending September 30, 1988, and for other purposes.

action.text: Committee on Rules Granted a Rule Providing One Hour of Debate; Waiving All Points of Order.
Called up by House by Rule.
Measure Considered in House as in the Committee of the Whole.

vote.text: Passed House by Yea-Nay Vote: 207 - 178 (Record Vote No: 502).
Received in the Senate, read twice, considered, read the third time, and passed without amendment by Voice Vote.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.

bill.summary: 12/20/1987--Introduced. Extends the deadline for availability of certain continuing appropriations for FY 1988 until December 21, 1987.
